channel.title: Architectural Review Committee on Aurora

item.title: ARC-001: Aurora Initiative
item.description: Date: March 26th, 2025 Location: [Virtual/In-Person] Presenter: William Hearn (Senior Cloud Architect, GC Cloud One) Attendees: ARC Members Objective: Review the Aurora initiative and secure approval for its strategic direction and technical architecture.
